title: Mark Hughes: Norris bounce back in Austria was spectacular
summary: From zero to hero: in a pacy McLaren, at one of his favourite F1 circuits, Lando Norris picked himself up from a disastrous Canadian race to reign supreme in the 2025 Austrian Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the 2025 Austrian Grand Prix?
What team does Lando Norris drive for?
What notable performance did Lando Norris achieve in Austria after a poor race in Canada?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He bounced back to win the race.
wrong_options: He finished in the top five.
